suggestions.original: To improve the line combinations in the artwork, focus on making the lines depicting the children's arms and hands more cohesive and consistent. Ensure that the lines are smooth and well-integrated with the rest of the composition. This will enhance the visual flow and harmony of the piece. Additionally, consider refining the lines around the edges of the rainbow to maintain the overall smoothness and consistency throughout the artwork.
